description: It's straight up cowboy country so get your boots on and saddle up 'cause we've got two hot buckaroos that are grabbin' their bulls by the horn and they're gonna take you on a ride that'll leave you standing in the bleachers yellin' yeehaw and beggin' for more.First up we've got Maverick all alone to ourselves. And we see from the start that he's just fine showing off his ass. He's proud of his saddle and I don't blame him. I lay there on the floor beneath him just droolin' in a daze and he's happy to entertain me as long as I want. Lucky for you I was in a daze because I think you'll like things from my point of view.
title: Maverick, Scene #01
